variations.template: It phases in before its controller untaps during their next untap step.
rts: It phases in before its controller untaps during their next untap step.

variations.template: Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don't exist until your next turn.
rts: Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don't exist until your next turn.

variations.template: Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don't exist until its controller's next turn.
rts: Treat it and anything attached to it as though they don't exist until its controller's next turn.

variations.template: While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist. It phases in before you untap during your next untap step.
rts: While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist. It phases in before you untap during your next untap step.

variations.template: While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist. It phases in before its controller untaps during their next untap step.
rts: While it's phased out, it's treated as though it doesn't exist. It phases in before its controller untaps during their next untap step.
